mapper.select: select job_trigger_msg as scheduler, job_handle_code, trace_id from skyworld_job_log where trace_id is not null and create_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and create_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

select task_log_id, task_key, task_status, trace_id from skyworld_task_log where task_key != 'endTask' and trace_id is not null and create_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and create_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

select job_group as ggroup, count(distinct job_key) as job_num, count(distinct trace_id) as call_num from skyworld_job_log where create_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and create_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') group by ggroup order by call_num desc
select task_group_name ggroup, count(task_id) task_num from skyworld_basic_task group by task_group_name

select sbj.job_group as ggroup, sbj.job_key as job_key from skyworld_basic_job sbj where sbj.job_key in (select sjl.job_key as job_key from skyworld_job_log sjl where sjl.job_handle_code='LOG_JOB_HANDLE_FAIL_STOP' and sjl.create_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and sjl.create_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))

select stl_tmp.task_key as task_key, stl_tmp.job_key as job_key, count(task_key) as exp_task_count from (select sjl.trace_id, sjl.create_time from skyworld_job_log sjl) sjl_tmp right join (select stl.task_log_id, stl.task_key, stl.job_key, stl.trace_id from skyworld_task_log stl where stl.task_status='FAIL' and stl.task_key!="endTask") stl_tmp on stl_tmp.trace_id=sjl_tmp.trace_id where sjl_tmp.create_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and sjl_tmp.create_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') group by task_key order by exp_task_count desc limit 0, 10
